sentence.Network_en: He was hand-picked for this job by the Admiral.
sentence.Network_cn: 他是由海军上将精心挑选出来担任这项工作的。

sentence.Network_cn: 这些葡萄是精心挑选用来榨汁的。

sentence.Network_en: He had made it his business to surround himself with a hand-picked group of bright young officers.
sentence.Network_cn: 他总会亲手挑选一批聪明而年轻的军官常伴他左右。

entry.def: If someone is hand-picked, they are very carefully chosen by someone in authority for a particular purpose or a particular job.

example.ex: He was hand-picked for this job by the Admiral...
example.tran: 他是由海军上将精心挑选出来担任这项工作的。

example.ex: Sokagakkai was able to hand-pick his successor.
example.tran: 创价学会可以仔细挑选其继任人。
